TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void SessionEndedEventHandler(object sender, SessionEndedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed SessionEndedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub SessionEndedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As SessionEndedEventArgs)
public delegate void SessionEndedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, SessionEndedEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: sender
param.span: 當 類別引發這個事件時，這個物件永遠都是 。

span.span: When this event is raised by the class, this object is always .
A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 代表將處理 事件的方法。

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立 委派時，必須識別處理事件的方法。When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要將事件與事件處理方法產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。To associate the event with your event-handling method, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理方法。The event-handling method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
